text: Ceto, the Foolish Millionaire (Turkish: Çeto salak milyoner) is a 1953 Turkish comedy film directed by Orhan Erçin.Evren p.43 ==Cast== * Orhan Erçin * Hayri Esen * Rana Sivga * Ayten Çankaya * Sadri Karan * Gazanfer Özcan * Mürüvet Sim ==References== ==Bibliography== * Burçak Evren. Türk sinema sanatçıları ansiklopedisi. Film-San Vakfı Yayınları, 1983. ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:1953 comedy films Category:Turkish-language films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish comedy films
title: Ceto, the Foolish Millionaire
